mean_cn: adj. 放荡的，不检点的，恣意挥霍的
mean_en: carelessly and foolishly wasting money, materials, etc. :very wasteful
word_etyma: pro很多…+flig打出+ate形容词后缀→把钱不断的打出去→挥霍
short_phrase: The profligate men spend all their money on women.
sentence: Her more profligate clients might pay her hundreds of dollars in an evening.
sentence_trans: 她更放荡的顾客可能一晚上就给她数百美元。
